name: TFF Pharmaceuticals, Inc.
description: TFF Pharmaceuticals, Inc. is a biotechnology company focused on developing and commercializing innovative drug delivery solutions using its proprietary Thin Film Freezing (TFF) technology. Founded in 2018, TFF Pharmaceuticals aims to enhance the therapeutic effectiveness of various medications by improving their solubility, stability, and bioavailability. The company specializes in creating thin film formulations that allow for the rapid dissolution of drugs, which can lead to improved patient outcomes and a better overall therapeutic experience. TFF Pharmaceuticals is particularly focused on addressing challenges associated with poorly soluble drugs, which represent a significant portion of the pharmaceutical market. By utilizing its TFF technology, the company has developed a pipeline of product candidates across multiple therapeutic areas, including treatments for respiratory diseases, oncology, and rare diseases. TFF Pharmaceuticals is committed to advancing healthcare through innovation and strives to bring transformative solutions to patients in need.
